df-trls
blocks.content: Define the set of all Trails (in an undirected graph). According to Wikipedia ("Path (graph theory)", ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Path_(graph_theory) , 3-Oct-2017): "A trail is a walk in which all edges are distinct. According to Bollobas: "... walk is called a trail if all its edges are distinct.", see Definition of [Bollobas] p. 5. Therefore, a trail can be represented by an injective mapping f from { 1 , ... , n } and a mapping p from { 0 , ... , n }, where f enumerates the (indices of the) different edges, and p enumerates the vertices. So the trail is also represented by the following sequence: p(0) e(f(1)) p(1) e(f(2)) ... p(n-1) e(f(n)) p(n). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens and Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: df-trlson
blocks.content: Define the collection of trails with particular endpoints (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens and Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-trlson(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(ctrlson, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), copab(s3, s4, wa(wbr(cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cfv(cwlkson, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cv(s4)), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(ctrls, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-trlson(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ TrailsOn =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Vtx ` s0), s2 ‚àà(Vtx ` s0)‚Ü¶ { < s3, s4 > |(s3[(s1[(WalksOn ` s0)]s2)]s4 ‚àß s3[(Trails ` s0)]s4)}))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: reltrls
blocks.content: The set ` ( Trails `` G ) ` of all trails on ` G ` is a set of pairs by our definition of a trail, and so is a relation. (Contributed by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: trlsfval
blocks.content: The set of trails (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Dec-2020.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm trlsfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(ctrls, c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), cv(s1)), wfun(ccnv(cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mptru(wceq(cfv(ctrls, c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), cv(s1)), wfun(ccnv(cv(s0)))))))
  fvmptopab(s0, s1, hs0, ctrls, c0, cwlks, wtru, wfun(ccnv(cv(s0))), wfun(ccnv(cv(s0))))
  biidd(wa(wtru, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wfun(ccnv(cv(s0))))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), cv(s1))), universe))
  wksv(s0, s1, c0)
  df-trls(hs0, s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cwlks)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w(wfun(ccnv(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trlsfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (Trails ` c0)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(Walks ` c0)]s1 ‚àß Fun(`' s0))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mptru((Trails ` c0)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(Walks ` c0)]s1 ‚àß Fun(`' s0))})
  fvmptopab(s0, s1, hs0, ctrls, c0, cwlks, wtru, Fun(`' s0), Fun(`' s0))
  biidd((T ‚àß hs0 = c0), Fun(`' s0))
  a1i(wtru, { < s0, s1 > | s0[(Walks ` c0)]s1 } ‚àà ùïå)
  wksv(s0, s1, c0)
  df-trls(hs0, s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cwlks)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w(Fun(`' s0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: istrl
blocks.content: Conditions for a pair of classes/functions to be a trail (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Dec-2020.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm istrl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wfun(ccnv(c0))))
} = {
  brfvopabrbr(hs0, hs1, c0, ctrls, c1, c2, cwlks, wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(cv(hs0))))
  trlsfval(hs0, hs1, c1)
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wfun(ccnv(cv(hs0))), wfun(ccnv(c0))))
  funeqd(ccnv(cv(hs0)), ccnv(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveq(cv(hs0), c0)
  relwlk(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cwlks)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cwlks)
  diff.hs0.w(wfun(ccnv(c0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wfun(ccnv(c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istrl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî(c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2 ‚àß Fun(`' c0)))
} = {
  brfvopabrbr(hs0, hs1, c0, ctrls, c1, c2, cwlks, Fun(`' c0), Fun(`' hs0))
  trlsfval(hs0, hs1, c1)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (Fun(`' hs0)‚Üî Fun(`' c0)))
  funeqd(`' hs0, `' c0, hs0 = c0)
  cnveq(hs0, c0)
  relwlk(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cwlks)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cwlks)
  diff.hs0.w(Fun(`' c0))
  diff.hs1.w(Fun(`' c0))
}

blocks.name: trlreslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ trlres . Formerly part of proof of ~ eupthres . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Mar-2021.) Hypothesis revised using the prefix operation. (Revised by AV, 30-Nov-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm trlreslem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c1, cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfv(ctrls, c5), c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cpfx, c3))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf1o(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c1, cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)))))), wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c5)))
  mpbird(w0, wf1o(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c1, cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3))))), wf1o(cres(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), co(nat0, cfzo, c3), cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3))))
  syl2anc(w0, wf1o(cres(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), co(nat0, cfzo, c3), cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3))), wf1(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), cdm(c1)), wss(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2))))
  syl(w0, wf1(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), cdm(c1)), wbr(c2, cfv(ctrls, c5), c6))
  trlf1(c2, c5, c6, c1)
  3syl(w0, wss(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2))), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2))), wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  elfzouz2(c3, nat0, cfv(chash, c2))
  fzoss2(cfv(chash, c2), c3, nat0)
  f1ores(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), cdm(c1), co(nat0, cfzo, c3))
  f1oeq123d(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c1, cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)))), cres(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), co(nat0, cfzo, c3), cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), w0)
  syl5eq(c0, cres(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), co(c2, cpfx, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c2, cpfx, c3), cres(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3))), wcel(c2, cword(cdm(c1))), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c2))))
  sseldi(c3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), w0)
  fzossfz(nat0, cfv(chash, c2))
  pfxres(c2, cdm(c1), c3)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0), c3, w0)
  syl5eq(cfv(chash, c0), c3, cfv(chash, co(c2, cpfx, c3)), w0)
  fveq2i(chash, c0, co(c2, cpfx, c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(c2, cpfx, c3)), c3), wcel(c2, cword(cdm(c1))), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c2))))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c2, cword(cdm(c1))), wbr(c2, cfv(ctrls, c5), c6), wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c5), c6))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c2))), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2))))
  elfzofz(c3, nat0, cfv(chash, c2))
  pfxlen(c2, cdm(c1), c3)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cdm(cres(c1, cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)))), cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3))), wss(cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), cdm(c1)))
  3syl(w0, wss(cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), cdm(c1)), wbr(c2, cfv(ctrls, c5), c6), wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c5), c6))
  trliswlk(c2, c5, c6)
  3syl(wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c5), c6), wss(cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(cdm(c1))), wf(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), cdm(c1)))
  wlkf(c2, c5, c6, c1)
  wrdf(c2, cdm(c1))
  fimass(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), cdm(c1), co(nat0, cfzo, c3))
  ssdmres(cima(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), c1)
}

blocks.name: trlres
blocks.content: The restriction ` <. H , Q >. ` of a trail ` <. F , P >. ` to an initial segment of the trail (of length ` N ` ) forms a trail on the subgraph ` S ` consisting of the edges in the initial segment. (Contributed by AV, 6-Mar-2021.) Hypothesis revised using the prefix operation. (Revised by AV, 30-Nov-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm trlres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ciedg, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c6, cfv(ctrls, c4), c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c6))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c6, cpfx, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c1), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c1), cres(c5, cima(c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c8)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cres(c7, co(nat0, cfz, c8)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wfun(ccnv(c0)))
  wlkres(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(c6, cfv(cwlks, c4), c7), wbr(c6, cfv(ctrls, c4), c7))
  trliswlk(c6, c4, c7)
  3syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(c0)), wf1o(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c5, cima(c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c8))))), wf1(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c5, cima(c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c8))))))
  trlreslem(c0, c5, c6, c8, c3, c4, c7, w0)
  f1of1(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c5, cima(c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c8)))))
  simprbi(wf1(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c5, cima(c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c8))))), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c5, cima(c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c8))))))
  df-f1(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cres(c5, cima(c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c8)))))
  istrl(c0, c1, c2)
}
